name: Schedule AI-Formatted Google News Digests with Gmail Approval Workflow
description: # Automate Google News Digests with AI & Gmail Approval Workflow in n8n ## Overview This n8n automation template shows how to automatically collect and format daily Google News digests on your chosen topics, send them to your Gmail inbox for quick approval, and‚Äîif declined‚Äîgenerate the next set of curated news articles until you approve. ==‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer: This workflow template uses community nodes and works only on n8n self-hosted instances. == ## Use case Streamline content curation for social media, newsletters, or blog posts by scheduling an AI-formatted Google News workflow that saves time in finding trending stories. ## How to use ‚è∞ Schedule the automation to run at your preferred time. üîé Fetch the latest trending Google News on your selected topic with SerpApi integration. ü§ñ Send articles in batches of 10 to an AI content formatter that generates clean HTML output. üìß Receive an approval email in your Gmail inbox with the AI-formatted news digest. ‚ùå Decline the digest to trigger the next batch of 10 curated news articles until you approve. üìä Workflow logic uses AirTable counters and a custom Code node to manage batching. ## Setup instructions - Connect your SerpApi, AirTable, OpenAI, and Gmail accounts. In the Gmail node, set the variable $env.EMAIL_ADDRESS_ME or replace the ‚ÄúTo‚Äù field with your email. - In AirTable, create a free-tier base with two columns: WorkflowID and Counter. The workflow will manage row creation and deletion automatically. - Define your news topic or keyword in the SerpApi ‚ÄúSearch Query (q)‚Äù field. - Run the workflow and check your Gmail inbox for your curated AI-powered news digest. ## Requirements - AirTable account - Gmail account - SerpApi account - OpenAI account ## Customising this workflow ‚è± Adjust the schedule in the ‚ÄúSchedule Trigger‚Äù node for daily, weekly, or custom timing. üîë Enter your niche news keyword in the ‚ÄúSearch Query (q)‚Äù field of the SerpApi node. üì¶ Change the batch size (default 10) inside the Code node ‚ÄúExtract Details.‚Äù üé® Personalize the Gmail approval email template inside the AI Agent node ‚ÄúPrepare Content Review Email‚Äù for branding or formatting preferences.

workflow.name: Schedule AI-Formatted Google News Digests with Gmail Approval Workflow

parameters.text:
=Generate clean, modern HTML email content from the provided JSON data with these requirements: - Use table-based layout with inline CSS for email compatibility - Create card sections for each platform containing: ‚Ä¢ Title header (20px) - Structure using: ‚Ä¢ 600px max-width container ‚Ä¢ 20px padding between cards ‚Ä¢ Left-aligned text hierarchy ‚Ä¢ Arial/sans-serif font stack ‚Ä¢ Email-safe colors (#333 text, #555 secondary) Input data: {{ $('Extract Details').item.json.out.toJsonString() }} Remove ALL code blocks and comments. Output ONLY the raw HTML with: - Platform cards in JSON order - All data elements represented - Mobile-responsive tables - W3C-valid markup ## Example HTML:

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
Source: AP News, Author: John Doe
Read more...

parameters.content:
### 
Use the SerpApi to obtain the latest Google News about a topic of interest.
About 100 news_results are returned.

### 
The workflow is triggered based on its schedule (ie: once a day).

### 
Create a AirTable record to use as a counter.

### 
If Declined:
prepare the next 10 news and send another Approval email.

### 
Some code to extract only the "headers" and a few details of each news.

### 
Use an AI Agent to generate the HTML email with the 10 news, based on our template.

### 
Send email and wait for Approve/Decline input.

parameters.message:
=Select the news article to repost:

{{ $('Prepare Content Review Email').item.json.output }}
parameters.subject: =üî•FOR APPROVALüî•Latest 10 Google News

parameters.content:
###
Keep up to date with the latest news about your favorite topics.

Save time in selecting the next news to repost on social media or blog about, with this scheduled workflow.


## How it works

- Get the latest Google News about your topics
- Pass them in batches of 10 to an AI Agent to be formatted in a neat HTML.
- Send the message with the HTML results to your Gmail for approval.
- If you Decline the batch, the next batch will be prepared and a new approval email sent.
- The workflow uses a global counter (a record in AirTable), used also by a code node to manage the batches.

## Set up steps

1. Connect to SerpApi, AirTable, OpenAI and Gmail accounts
2. Execute the workflow and check your email!

## Notes

You can swap the AI Agent from OpenAI to other n8n Chat Models, or replacing the Gmail approval node with a generic "Send message and wait for response" node to another email provider, or replacing the AirTable counter with a Google Sheet.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
